solution.text:
Length of an edge of a box \(=_{{j*5}}_cm\)
Total number of edges \(=12\)
Therefore, tape needed to fix all the edges of a single box\(=12 \times _{{j*5}}_\)
\(=_{{12*j*5}}_cm=_{{(60/Decimal(100))*j}}_m\)

content.text: If all the edges are held together by tape, how much tape is needed for all the edges of a single box? (in metres)
